channel.title: Ok I need some help
channel.description: Ok I do have npc training in my server (I just realized) But it is the same amount as rs xp gives. How would I change the xp given when attacking an npc?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2007, 04:05:16 PM[/size][hr]So can anyone help me?
